title: Coefficient on H3PO4 in balanced reaction equation

content.prompt:
. . . Ca3(PO4)2(s) + . . . H3PO4(l) â†’ . . . Ca(H2PO4)2(s)

When the equation above is balanced and all coefficients are reduced to lowest whole-number terms, what is the coefficient for H3PO4(l) ?

skill.text: 5.E: Determine a balanced chemical equation for a given chemical phenomenon.
